pkgmetadata.longdescription: gffutils========``gffutils`` is a Python package for working with and manipulating the GFF andGTF format files typically used for genomic annotations.Files are loaded into a sqlite3 database, allowing much more complexmanipulation of hierarchical features (e.g., genes, transcripts, and exons)than is possible with plain-text methods alone.See documentation at https://daler.github.io/gffutils, and GitHub repo athttps:/github.com/daler/gffutils.
